page.title: 10Village Life
page.content: There are no{shops}in the village now. The{post office}opens on 3 days for a few hours. Nearly every one goes out of the village to their jobs. 2 people work at the pub, one or two have a business where they saw logs. Two people work at the garage. There are 2{grocery vans}that come twice a week and a{bakery van.}Most shopping is done in Newport 7 miles away. But the buses are every two hours. It costs 85p to Newport or 60p in the other direction to Yarmouth. The{library van}comes round every fortnight. If old people can not get out to the van the driver will bring about 20 books in for them to choose from.He has childrens books and adult books and will get any books you ask for.
